item.title: BukaPengadaan by Bukalapak
item.description: About BukaPengadaan (PT. Buka Pengadaan Indonesia) is a leader B2B e-commerce in Indonesia from Bukalapak. Links Website: https://www.bukapengadaan.com/ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bukapengadaan/

item.title: C++ MJPEG over HTTP Library
item.description: https://github.com/nadjieb/cpp-mjpeg-streamer Features No OpenCV dependencies (Clear problems separation) Set different streams depending on HTTP GET path Multi-threaded streaming Single Header-only library Graceful shutdown

item.title: DAGOZILLA ITB
item.description: About Founded in 2016, DAGOZILLA ITB is a research team from Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB) focuses on Mobile Robot Development. Contributions Co-founded and built a strong multidisciplinary engineering team. Developed vision system with OpenCV in C++ for Mobile Soccer Robots. Guided the team until in 2020 to be qualified for RoboCup Middle Size League for the first time (https://msl.robocup.org/news/2020-qualification-results). Currently helping the team to be more sustainable by creating a more structured curriculum for regeneration.

item.title: Mitra Bukalapak
item.description: About Mitra Bukalapak is an O2O (online-to-offline) product from Bukalapak. Links Website: https://mitra.bukalapak.com/
